items.sentence: This movie was written and directed by Tom Jackson.
If you don\'t eat fast, you\'ll be late for school.
According to the thermometer, it\'s thirty degrees.
I think it\'s time to start helping Tom a bit more.
You do know that Tom and Mary broke up, don\'t you?
You don\'t want to let on how smart you really are.
Tom found out that Mary wasn\'t really from Boston.
Tom says you\'re lying about what time you arrived.
Tom stole the cash that was in Mary\'s desk drawer.
Tom should\'ve let his children go camping with us.
Tom should\'ve told Mary why she needed to do that.
Why don\'t we eat out at a restaurant for a change?
Why don\'t you ever take me with you on your trips?
Why don\'t you tell me a little bit about yourself?
Women don\'t wear dresses as often as they used to.
You must be blind as a bat if you couldn\'t see it.
How can you tell who\'s innocent and who\'s guilty?
I think we shouldn\'t tell Tom about what happened.
I think we\'re going to ask Tom to help us do that.
Tom couldn\'t remember what he had intended to say.
